text: Pastor Paula White-Cain, White House Spiritual Advisor: "I declare divine intervention and supernatural turnaround. You will restore this land." https://t.co/NFUxGpBpor

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Supernatural
entity.description: This haunting series follows the thrilling yet terrifying journeys of Sam and Dean Winchester, two brothers who face an increasingly sinister landscape as they hunt monsters. After losing their mother to a supernatural force, the brothers were raised by their father as soldiers who track mysterious and demonic creatures. Violent memories and relationship-threatening secrets add additional burdens on Sam and Dean as they investigate all things that go bump in the night. As old tricks and tools are rendered useless and friends betray them, the brothers must rely on each other as they encounter new enemies.

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
